statements: SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback;
SELECT product_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, product_id FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE product_id = 100 AND rating <= 2;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT user_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_feedback > 2
SELECT user_id, product_id, MAX(rating) AS highest_rating FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id, product_id
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%excellent%'
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, product_id, rating FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT user_id, rating, comment FROM user_feedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id, product_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(user_id) > 1;
SELECT user_id, product_id, COUNT(feedback_id) AS num_feedback FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id, product_id ORDER BY num_feedback DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(review_id) AS num_reviews FROM user_reviews GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_reviews > 2 ORDER BY num_reviews DESC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, MIN(rating) AS min_rating, MAX(rating) AS max_rating FROM user_feedback WHERE user_id = 100 GROUP BY user_id, product_id;
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback;
SELECT user_id, rating, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT product_id, review_text, review_date FROM ProductReviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT username, email, location FROM UserProfiles WHERE location='New York';
SELECT feedback_id, product_id, user_id, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%'
SELECT * FROM UserFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, product_id, rating FROM UserFeedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT u.user_id, u.username, p.product_id, p.review_text FROM UserProfiles u JOIN ProductReviews p ON u.user_id = p.user_id;
SELECT feedback_id, rating, feedback_text FROM UserFeedback WHERE feedback_text LIKE '%great%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT username, email, location FROM UserProfiles WHERE joined_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users;
SELECT product_name, product_description FROM products_information;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM user_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_email, product_name FROM users JOIN products_information ON users.user_id = products_information.product_id;
SELECT user_name, product_name, rating FROM users JOIN user_feedback ON users.user_id = user_feedback.user_id WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT product_name, AVG(rating) as avg_rating FROM products_information JOIN user_feedback ON products_information.product_id = user_feedback.product_id GROUP BY product_name;
SELECT user_name, review_text, review_date FROM users JOIN user_reviews ON users.user_id = user_reviews.user_id ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks;
SELECT id, user_id, product_id, rating, comments FROM feedbacks;
SELECT username, email, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT name, category, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT id, name, description, category FROM services ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedbacks WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT id, comments FROM feedbacks WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT products.name, products.price, ratings.rating FROM products INNER JOIN ratings ON products.id = ratings.feedback_id WHERE ratings.rating >= 4;
SELECT users.username, ratings.rating, ratings.date_rated FROM users INNER JOIN ratings ON users.id = ratings.user_id WHERE ratings.date_rated BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT services.name, services.price, feedbacks.comments FROM services INNER JOIN feedbacks ON services.id = feedbacks.product_id WHERE feedbacks.rating = 5;
